conversation:
user: So my #Sprint account has been labeled as "Fraudulent" for a year, I just found out about this today when I went to get a new phone...
agent: Hey. This is unfortunate. Is it that you visited a store and was provided with this information? Did they indicate why? - DW
user: Oh yeah, I had to wait a while to see an associate, then found out about this, then had to call, and sort it out. All good now, but... ...still wasn't a fun situation to have dropped in my lap, specially since it was last Nov when the incident happened.
agent: Totally understandable. I'm sorry you had to go through this and hope you understand that we're only trying to protect your account. - DW
user: I get that. I appreciate Sprint not letting someone buy 4 iPhone 7's on my account, but it would've been nice to be notified immediately.
agent: I'm glad everything is sorted out now though and hope you enjoy your new device. I'm sorry you were not notified. - DW
user: Oh, they wouldn't sell me a phone cause I got married and changed my name and said they couldn't take care of that instore. It's been a day.
agent: To be clear, you have not gotten your device yet? - DW
user: Nope. Gotta send you guys some paperwork about my marriage/name change for review first, is what I was told. Don't get me wrong after the fraud stuff I'm okay with some extra steps/rules to follow.
agent: Once the name change is processed, all should be fine. Hope it's fixed soon. - DW
user: Hopefully! We shall see though. In the meantime, thank you for your time and excellent communication!
agent: Your welcome! Also, best of luck in the marriage. Few are lucky like that. Treasure it brother. - DW
summary: Customer is complaining that their Sprint account has been labelled as Fraudulent for a year and they found this today when they went to buy a new phone. Agent updates that once the name change process is completed everything will be fine.

user: internet and fios down 5 hours when message told it would be on in 1 hour. Unable reach support online. Could you help
agent: We would love to help with this! The internet and TV are down right now?
user: Yes
agent: Thank you for confirming. We would like to try to reset the battery backup unit which will trigger a reset to the main network terminal. Do you know where the batter backup unit is at in the home? It may look like one of the following models.

user: iPhone 7 Plus, running 11.0.2. currently the log in screen just says "Log In" at the top, and the running intro video loop
agent: Could you send a screenshot of how exactly it appears from your end? /JL
user: It takes ~5 minutes between pressing ‚ÄúLog In‚Äù and getting to that screen. Then it holds there, with the video looping. Reinstalled twice
agent: Hmm. Could you try removing the app again, restarting your device, then reinstalling? Also, does this happen on other devices? /JL
user: I figured out a fix after this happening a few times: go back to main screen, press Log In again: correct screen loads Literally, it's go back a page, go forward again.
agent: It's good to hear that you can log in now. Just to check, after logging out, does the same still happen when trying to log back in? /JL

agent: Just to confirm, does this also happen on any other device you have? Trying a different network connection might also help /JL
user: I see no reason to un/reinstall the application on desktop or continue to test this on different networks. Problem began with new mobile app
agent: We understand. Let's continue troubleshooting on your phone. Can you DM us your account's username and email address? /JL

conversation:
user: U changed my flight, I lose boarding position A to C & wouldn't let me $ for priority boarding during check in! #poorservice
agent: Mike, in these situations, we're only able to issue the next available boarding position. Did you discuss Upgraded Boarding @ the Gate?
user: I did but was told they just sold the last position right before me. I ask to purchase it when I was checking my bag and was told I couldn't
agent: Sorry for the trouble, Mike. Upgraded Boarding is popular & sells out fast. Fingers crossed for next time; see you onboard!
user: Why are we not allowed to upgrade our positron at the time of the change during luggage check in?
agent: Because we allow Passengers to easily make changes to reservations, we don't have an accurate count until closer to boarding time. (1/2)  As such, our Gate Agents have the ability to offer Upgraded Boarding when available within one hour of departure. (2/2)
user: That makes sense. Wish your check in agent would have explained it that way.
agent: We're so sorry for your continued frustration. We hope you will give us another chance.
summary: Customer is complaining about the poor service where they changed their flight and lost boarding position A to C and wouldn't let them $ for priority boarding during check in. Agent updates that their Gate agents have the ability to offer Upgraded boarding when available within one hour of departure and apologies for their continued frustration.

conversation:
user: Yo my residential internet service has been down all day... wassup?? !
agent: Let's take a look. Any red lights on your router?
user: Yes
agent: Do you know where the Battery Backup unit is located?
user: No. I've unplugged and reset the router multiple times
agent: The BBU can sometimes be located in a garage or basement and can look like 1 of the 2 units.
user: What do you want me to do with that?
agent: Press and hold the Alarm Silence or reset button for 15 seconds. Give it 5 min and then check to see if your service comes back on.
user: Fixed! Thanks!
agent: Awesome, Enjoy your night.

conversation:
user: Good morning. When did your policy on carrying guitars on board change?
agent: Hi Antonio, what part of our policy for travelling with a musical instrument are you referring to?
user: That guitars must be in a hard case and checked into the hold. I was informed at check in. I wish I‚Äôd been informed before travelling.
agent: Hi Antonio, did you contact us before travelling to let us know you would be carrying a guitar on your travels? We're sorry for any inconvenience this has caused you. We will try and make room in the cabin when possible but this cannot be guaranteed. 2/2
user: Well, it‚Äôs just never been policy before ‚Äî as far as I know ‚Äî that guitars are outright not permitted in the cabin. 1/4 If I bring a guitar in a soft case (so that it can be stowed in an overhead) and it is checked, there‚Äôs a high damage risk in the hold 2/4 But if I bring a guitar in a hard case, it‚Äôs definitely going to get checked into the hold ‚Äî so then I risk damage from baggage handling 3/4 It‚Äôs a catch 22, and it makes me worry if I can travel on BA with a guitar for work, as I need the instrument intact at the other end üòï 4/4
agent: Hi Antonio, we understand your concerns. As previously advised, we will try and allow it to be stored in the cabin but it cannot be guaranteed. We've passed on your comments for consideration next time this policy is reviewed. 2/2
user: Thanks. I‚Äôve been on E170s where the ground crew have said, ‚ÄúThe flight‚Äôs full, no way it‚Äôll fit‚Äù, then there‚Äôs been a dozen empty overheads
agent: Hi Antonio, this is disappointing to hear. We understand how important it is to keep musical instruments safe during travel and we'll do all we can to make sure all our staff are fully trained on this this and understand when to make allowances. 2/2
summary: Customer is telling that the he was informed during the check in that guitar should be carried out in hard case but not informed earier. Agent is replying that they will try to allow it to store in cabin for that particular travel.

user: Just got a friendly reminder from support my bill is due. Also a friendly reminder I should downgrade. I‚Äôve never gotten 1gbps down. Why should I pay for it?

user: Residential, FiOS. But I‚Äôve had the issue before. Your speed test tool says I do, every other speed test tool says I don‚Äôt.
agent: We only recognize our speed test site as it was designed to work with our service. What speeds are you getting on our site?
user: I‚Äôve never gotten less than 988mbps down on your site, even when I very clearly am not getting that. It is an unreliable source, IMO. My internet is fine now. It‚Äôs just that when I do have real issues, your tools report no problem. It‚Äôs very hard for me to gauge/troubleshoot/get help if the prognosis is ‚Äúwe see nothing wrong.‚Äù
agent: Ok, the main thing is if you were able to directly connect a computer to your router with an ethernet cord and run the test at we would then see an accurate speed test.
user: I really don‚Äôt want to seem unreasonable, but none of my computers have ethernet cables and haven‚Äôt for like 4 years. It‚Äôs fine. I am experiencing no issues now. I just want to relay the feedback that make your speed test tool shouldn‚Äôt be the end all, be all because it *is* inaccurate sometimes.
agent: Any device that is not connected directly to ethernet and running on Wifi would be susceptible to interference, which could lower the results. Our test shows not only what the device is getting with the interference , it also shows what speeds the router is getting.

user: I booked my flights with city bookers on a BA flight. How can I manage my booking?

agent: That's great, Adam. We look forward to welcoming you on board.

user: Dubai to London then London to Newcastle return.

user: So obvious why a #failing, T5 completely DEAD, more staff then passengers, terrible customer service, & still can't get on my plane even though it was not due to leave for 50min.
agent: Hi Thamin, if you arrived after check-in for your flight had closed we wouldn't be able to accept you for the flight. Even if the airport is quiet, check in times still need to be met.
user: Natalie I was 5min late. Plane wasn't expected to leave for 55min, airport was empty, pretty sure security would be too, (would guess the plane was too)I'm confident I could have made it to the gate with ample time, with just a tiny bit of your help.
agent: Hi Thamin, I'm afraid this isn't something we can offer any flexibility with. It's not possible to check in for a flight after check in closes, as the system doesn't allow it. Late arrivals can cause flight delays and we apply the same policy to everyone, not just when it's 1/2 busy. I can understand your disappointment, but it's your responsibility to arrive at the airport in good time and complete check in before it closes.  S. 2/2
user: Just for clarification ü§î- so you never allow anyone and have allowed in the past people that are late for checkin? Could you kindly direct me to this policy too please. And are you sure Beth that the system does not allow you to do late check-ins?
agent: We're sorry, Thamim. If you follow this link, it does advise you Click check in essentials. It is your responsibility to arrive at the airport with enough time.
user: You've not answered all my questions - I take my responsibility for being 5min late, but your staff could have easily (assessed it's not busy and) check me in.
agent: We appreciate the points you've raised, Thamim. However, once check in has been closed, we're unable to reopen a passenger list. We hope you understand we have to be fair and consistent with all of our passengers. 1/2 This means our staff wouldn't have been able to make an exception when you travelled. We hope this message helps to clarify our position. 2/2
user: Thank you for the response- but it doesn't suffice and is unacceptable, you're flights are always delayed and customers get no compensation. You also make different exceptions for different people it seems
agent: EU compensation depends on the reason for a delay or cancellation, Thamim. Not all flights are eligible as not all reasons are under our control. We're sorry you remain disappointed, however, as previously advised it's your responsibility to make sure you arrive at the 1/2 airport and check in, in time for your flight. We're unable to hold a flight for a passenger if they are late. Our position remains unchanged.  2/2
user: Natalie - do me favour, let's quantify this: how long on average it takes to get from checkin desk to the furthest boarding gates at T5? And for the record I wasn't asking you to hold a flight, the plane wasn't due to leave for 50min (and it was still delayed by 20min)
agent: Hi Thamin. It can depend on a lot of factors. We appreciate you may not have been asking to hold the flight. If you're late to check in, there isn't any way for you to make the flight, even if the flight is delayed. We're sorry you remain disappointed with our response.
summary: The customer says that he would have been allowed for check in since he was delayed by only 5 minutes. The agent replies that any customer wouldn't be allowed for check-ins if arrived after check in is closed and it applies to all of their customers.

conversation:
user: Hi! My Samsung M3 portable hard drive is recognised in Disk Management on my Windows 10 laptop but it's not showing up in Windows Explorer for me to access the files and back up to. Any ideas please on what to do?! Thanks in advance.
agent: It may be helpful to see how the drive is partitioned in Disk Management. Please share a screenshot of this. Did the drive previously work on this Windows 10 laptop? Any recent software updates? No secret zone set up for the M3 drive?
user: Hi! Ok I will do. Sorry, currently away at the moment (helpful I know) but will send a screenshot over when I‚Äôm back, thanks! Hi again! Here is a screenshot of my disk management. I‚Äôm pretty sure I have used it since updating to Windows 10. I‚Äôm afraid I don‚Äôt know what a secret zone is!
agent: It seems that the drive is corrupted. Have you tried it on another computer and or with another USB cable? Is it detected in Device Manager? Is it connected directly to the USB port of your computer?
user: Oh right! I‚Äôm surprised by that as I only use it once every couple of months to back up my computer and have only had it for two years. I‚Äôll try the things you‚Äôve suggested, thanks! If it‚Äôs corrupted can I re-format it at all? It's connected directly to the USB port but still shows in disk management when it's unplugged. Can I do anything else? I don't mind losing everything that's on there.
agent: Did you ever set up a password protected "Secret Zone" using the software that came with your M3? The drive should disappear from Disk Management if the drive is not installed on a USB port. Does Disk 1 show even after a reboot when the M3 drive is not installed? Let us know,
user: No I didn‚Äôt. It did disappear, sorry I was getting confused! Disk 1 reappears when I plug the hard drive back in. I think it‚Äôs corrupted beyond repair unless you have any other solutions?
agent: Can you initialize the drive by right clicking within the box that indicates the drive is not initialized? If disk cannot be initialized, you can try Diskpart but be careful using this to make sure the correct disk is chosen Both answers will erase data
user: I‚Äôve tried the diskpart solution but sadly that won‚Äôt let me initialise the drive after that eitherüò©üò©.
agent: Given your description, if the drive will not initialize no matter what computer/port is tried, and diskpart also does not work, then the drive may be nonfunctional. Check your warranty/return options here
summary: Customer is complaining about the corrupted external hard disk. Agent states that the drive may be nonfunctional.

text:
### Instruction: Below is a conversation between a human and an AI agent. Write a summary of the conversation.

### Input:
user: left my laptop on the flight down from Edinburgh. Your new lost property procedures are a shambles. Nobody knows what to do and to have to wait 24 hours is shocking. Seat 1a in club Europe. Shocking
agent: Hi Craig, anything left on board that's found, is handed in to Lost Property at the airport. It can take over 24 hours to be logged 1/2
user: I was a domestic flight so no security issues so why can‚Äôt it be sent directly from the aircraft to the lost property section which in 25 meters as the crow flys from where we disembarked. I‚Äôm flying back now so a wasted day as NO presentation. My fault but this new system is . I was also sent from person to person as the new rules are confusing as well as being on hold for 1 hour at the baggage office. In the end I drive back to LHR to try and retrieve it but with NO luck
agent: We're sorry this has caused you problems today, Craig. Unfortunately it's not always as simple as sending the item to lost property. It 1/2 has to be located and logged before we can reunite it with the passenger. You will need to continue to contact the airport directly. 2/2
user: A teddy bear I understand but a laptop off a domestic flight in the club Europe cabin and a return flight the same day needs a quicker processing time. Also to wait 1 hour on the phone and then they hang up is shocking. Not a good switch BA. ‚ÄúFound items can take up to 7 days to reach us from aircrafts‚Äù at what point do you go back to the old system. My work are furious, meeting in london was a no go and now having to borrow one for a trip today.
agent: Hi Craig, we're sorry for the problems you've had contacting Lost Property, and for the inconvenience of being without your laptop. We hope you're reunited with it soon.

### Response:
Customer is complaining about the new lost property procedures where nobody knows what to do and has to wait for 24 hrs since they have left the laptop on the flight down from Edinburgh. Agent apologies for the problems they have with lost property and for the inconvenience of being without their laptop.

user: How do I set my Macbook Pro's resolution to 1280x720 without attaching a 2nd monitor? 13" Mid 2014 with Sierra
agent: Try setting that by following this article: Let us know if this helps.
user: I have read a couple of these kinds of articles, but I want this to work without having to attach a second monitor. I just want to set the resolution and then record my screen. And then upload to Youtube.
agent: Check these steps out from the article: Set the resolution for the primary display: Choose Apple menu > System Preferences, click Displays, then click Display. Pick Scaled, then select one of the options. After Scaled, you should see the resolution you want.
user: In Scaled I can set the following resolutions: 1024x640, 1280x800, 1440x900, 1680x1050.
agent: We missed that you were looking for 1280 x 720. We can get you to that resolution. Press and hold the Option key on your keyboard while you click on the Scaled option in the Display Setting. This will open up other options for you. Click 1280 x 720 here.

agent: Pressing the button on its own will not do anything. However, if you press and hold Option and then click the little bubble to the immediate left of the word "Scaled", you should see the other options appear.

user: how long is it before you contact someone who's taken my bag by mistake. I've got a lost luggage ref number. Got told today that a similar bag got left so that's who probably has mine. I've got the majority of my clothes in it and want them back asap.
agent: We're sorry, Dan. If we delivered your bag to the carousel and someone else picked it up we're not responsible for contacting them on your behalf. However, if there's been a bag left behind we'll do all we can to get in touch with that customer for them to retrieve it.
user: When I spoke to BA on the phone earlier they said there had been a bag left behind that is similar. They said you can't return theirs until mine has been returned. It's a bit annoying that you can't contact them and enquire if they have mine by mistake. What are my options?
agent: Hi Dan, I can appreciate your frustration. Unfortunately, we're unable to do anything until your bag has been returned, as you already know. You could contact the police and report your bag as stolen, or file a lost bag claim with your travel insurance company.
user: So people can just get off your flights and take whatever baggage they want? great that is!! You literally have to ring up one person and you won't, I'll not be using BA again in a hurry!
agent: Hi Dan. As soon as the passenger who has collected your bag gets back in touch with us, we'll have more information. I'm sorry we're unable to assist further.
user: Thanks Kev how long do I need to leave it before putting a claim in with you or the insurance?
agent: Hi Dan. If another passenger has your bag, you wouldn't be able to make a claim with us. You may be able to claim through your insurance so you may want to contact them.
user: So is there absolutely no possibility that you can contact the person who's bag was left and ask. Obviously I would but you wouldn't be able to give me their details. I've got presents etc in the bag and no money to replace them now, so it's essentially ruined my Christmas.
agent: We wouldn't be able to give you their details for data protection reasons, Dan. We can't guarantee we can do anything, as your bag arrived on the carousel. However, please DM us your baggage ref, email and postal address.
summary: Someone else has taken their bag after a flight and left their own similar case and wants to know when BA will contact the customer, also asks when they can make an insurance claim. conversation:
user: Because of your crap system & equipment, I only get the first 13 channels. It explains why my renters mess with the wiring to be able to watch something. I wonder if I can cancel your bulk contract for non-performance?
agent: Our apologies for any frustrations or inconvenience Alan. Is there anything we may be able to assist with?  .
user: Find me a technical support person who understands Bulk agreements with Multi-Dwelling Units. So far front line CS and the supervisor have no idea what I am talking about.
agent: Is this a business class account?  .
user: Yes. Krishna K. got it fixed. But not without some struggles. As a weekly rental property, this can't be an ongoing problem and there has to be an easy way for them to solve it.
agent: I'm glad to hear Krishna was able to get the matter taken care of you. Was she a business class representative?  .
user: No idea. She did not appear to understand the bulk agreement, but was eventually able to locate the account and communicate with my DTA. She wasn't able to give me detailed information on what she did. Just said it wouldn't happen again. I have to say I am skeptical based on history. This is a rental unit & guests won't troubleshoot, they'll just bypass the DTA. Not a good thing.
agent: I understand. I'm hopeful you wouldn't experience issues again. However, if you do, I would certainly recommend speaking with our business class department as I'm sure they will have a quick & full access to your account. Do you have contact information...
user: Is it available 24/7? Would a guest be able to call? What info would they have to give?
agent: That would depend on their reason for calling. If they're having service related issues they may not need to provide much account details. However, this would be at the discretion of the representative they speak with. The contact telephone number is 866.243.9787.  .
user: Is it 24/7? You do understand that discretion of the representative is not what a renter who has paid good money to enjoy vacation wants to hear. Easy to do business with, is best.
agent: I apologize for the inconvenience. If there is anything I can do to assist you in the future please feel free to reach out to us

user: I was wanting to look into possibly upgrading my seat (GINX36) but the seating chart says 1st class and delta comfort are all gone. That's impossible.

I'm showing First Class is sold out for your flights; however, Delta Comfort + is available. The Delta Comfort + cabin is sold as a fare for this market; therefore, in order to confirm Comfort + there will be a difference in the fare. *HML
user: What does this upgrade list mean? And this one for the first leg of the flight?
agent: It looks like there may an error between our system and the app. I'm checking into this now. *HML

agent: Thanks for your patience. I am showing seats available in First Class; however, the lower First Class fares are not available. user: This explanation sounds very convoluted. 1st there was no seats available, now there are seats, but there are no more lower 1st class fares available? What's does that mean and how do I upgrade seats. That's the whole reason I tweeted you. Cmon Delta aka *HML
agent: Freddie, in order upgrade your ticket to First Class, you must pay the difference in the fare. This does not include taxes and airport fees and fares are not guaranteed until purchased. Please contact our International Reservation specialist at 1-800-241-4141. *HML
summary: Customer is complaining about the inconvenience of unavailable first class seats and asking is there no value of purchased tix. conversation:
user: the 2120 Salisbury train from Waterloo. Not really getting much info guys.... So it was incorrectly coupled?? Really???? Your driver decoupled and recoupled it and the doors "magically worked". Serious breach in protocol there guys. Playing with safety because previous driver wanted to clock out.
agent: On occasion the electrical contacts that the trains use to pass communications for door controls, power and brake, information systems, etc will not make contact properly. In these cases, detaching and reattaching is the approved process taken in line with our fleet 1/3 team's fault-finding instructions, and done under the instruction of maintenance staff and the fleet control manager. The train's fail-safe systems would not allow it to move in this situation, and if we could not resolve the problem, the train would be taken out of service. 2/3 Safety is, and always will be, our first priority, and in this case protocols were followed correctly. Our fleet team will investigate using on-board monitoring systems as to what when wrong in this case and take appropriate action.  3/3
user: So wait a second. Once a driver couples the train it's not protocol to test immediately, but to wait until the carriages are full of passengers to then couple? That's your statement?
agent: On more modern stock the train will undertake the necessary tests to confirm. With older trains, there is a "pull-away" test to confirm the trains are physically coupled together, but it is not always immediately apparent that the all of the 100+ contacts on the train 1/3 type in question are making suitable contact. Any one of these pins not making proper contact can result in the train not being able to move as part of fail-safe systems built in. As mentioned, more modern trains such as our 450 and 444 types have computer systems on board 2/3 which test each signal passing through the contacts to confirm that the train is attached both physically and electronically.  3/3
user: Whilst I'm still shocked, I appreciate the fullness of the answer! :)
agent: No worries - I'm ex train-crew, so this is rather my specialist topic! Appreciate that it seems a little antiquated, but it's all vetted and okayed by the safety bodies. It's similar to the modern trains, where resolving problems can often come down to turning off the 1/2 train's management systems and turning them back on again!  2/2
user: Ahh that makes sense, thought the response was a little more detailed than usual. As a regular passenger I like understanding more, helps me to work around problems and know when to make alternative plans. It's amazing how often turning it off and on again actually works
agent: I always try to give something a bit more detailed, running a railway often has a lot more to it than it appears (I was recently conversing with about emissions standards, which was an interesting research topic). Benefits of 6 years experience though!
summary: Customer is asking that salisbury train from waterloo. Agent updated that he was giving information more detailed, running a railway often gas a lot more to it than it appears.

conversation:
user: Hey Check out my result! #speedtest - I pay for 100/100 . Help please?
agent: That's not good. Are testing from a wired or wireless device?
user: Thanks for the response! It's via wifi - tested in different areas of the house and speeds vary dramatically. Quickest I've got is 34 down
agent: Are you able to test the speed on a wired device?
user: Wired: 98.15 down / 71.56 up . Might be wifi broadcasting? Using WRT 3200 ACM router . Back to original wifi situation - Now 9.87 down , 11.85 up . This is all over the place and not consistent service?
agent: What model router are you using?
user: WRT 3200 ACM by Linksys
agent: We do not support 3rd party routers, do you have a Verizon Router?
user: I thought you did? and
agent: We are not able to troubleshoot third party devices, to determine if the issue is with the network we need to have our router connected.
user: Totally understand that piece - this issue actually happened previously when I had my VZ router only. I'm based in Peekskill, NY.
agent: Are you able to connect our Verizon router or bypass the router and connect directly to your device?
user: No VZ router on the property sadly
agent: If you hardwire in, everything is good and there are no speed issues. That means the signal we are providing is good. Once you use the 3rd party router and WiFi connect your speed drops. There is nothing we can do unless you have our router. Have you tried contacting Linksys?
summary: Customer is asking to check the speed test for which he pay 100. Agent says that nothing can do unless have their router.

user: Issue while exporting a PPro seq in AME - colors over saturated & 1 shot was too bright & washed out. Any thoughts? #postchat #PremierePro
agent: Hi Clint, are colors exporting fine in PPro? Change the renderer in Media Encoder & try export again. Thanks.
user: Everything looks fine straight out of PPro. Tried rendering ProRes 422HQ & H.264 w/ modified Vimeo settings from AME. Had issues on both. The crazy thing is, only 1 shot out of a 15-min seq looked too bright & washed out. Other shots looked over saturated. Haven't tried any other settings B/C those 2 were the only ones I needed for this particular project.
agent: Let the expert review & respond.  In AME preferences, General > Premiere Pro > Uncheck "Import Sequences natively"; Media > Uncheck "Enable accelerated Intel h.264" & test.

user: I need help. I do not have your service (6+ hours to setup and cancel an install!) but the previous homeowner did. There is an ONT in the basement that sends out a loud, very annoying beep every 15 minutes? This is ridiculous. How do I stop it?
agent: Press and hold the alarm silence button/ONT reboot button on the unit for 30 seconds. That will silence it.
user: Alright, done. Will reply back later if it beeps again. Am I expected to do this every 24 hours? That's how long the Alarm Silence lasted. Bedden back to beeping every 15 minutes since this morning.
agent: Try unplugging the power and removing the battery. After 3mins, put the battery back in and power on. This should help with the beeping. Let us know.
user: I have no service with you at all. Can't I just unplug it and remove the battery forever?
agent: Yes, you can do that since you do not have service with us. When the battery is dead the beeping will stop.
user: Thank you!
agent: You are welcome!
summary: Customer is complaining that there is an ONT in the basement that send a loud beep evry 15 mins and they do not have any service. Agent updates that they can unplug it and remove the battery forever since they do not have service wth them, when battery is dead, the beeping will automatically stops.
